trans-unit.source: Update the app to call the custom API
trans-unit.target: Update the app to call the custom API

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, open the default.html file in your quickstart project, locate the **button** element named `buttonRefresh`, and add the following new element right after it:
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, open the default.html file in your quickstart project, locate the **button** element named `buttonRefresh`, and add the following new element right after it:

trans-unit.source: This adds a new button to the page.
trans-unit.target: This adds a new button to the page.

trans-unit.source: Open the default.js code file in the `js` project folder, locate the **refreshTodoItems** function and make sure that this function contains the following code:
trans-unit.target: Open the default.js code file in the `js` project folder, locate the **refreshTodoItems** function and make sure that this function contains the following code:

trans-unit.source: This filters the items so that completed items are not returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: This filters the items so that completed items are not returned by the query.

trans-unit.source: After the **refreshTodoItems** function, add the following code:
trans-unit.target: After the **refreshTodoItems** function, add the following code:

trans-unit.source: This method handles the **Click** event for the new button.
trans-unit.target: This method handles the **Click** event for the new button.

trans-unit.source: The **InvokeApiAsync** method is called on the client, which sends a POST request to the new custom API.
trans-unit.target: The **InvokeApiAsync** method is called on the client, which sends a POST request to the new custom API.

trans-unit.source: The result returned by the custom API is displayed in a message dialog, as are any errors.
trans-unit.target: The result returned by the custom API is displayed in a message dialog, as are any errors.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the app.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the app.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type some text in **Insert a TodoItem**, then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type some text in **Insert a TodoItem**, then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Repeat the previous step until you have added several todo items to the list.
trans-unit.target: Repeat the previous step until you have added several todo items to the list.

trans-unit.source: A message dialog is displayed that indicates the number of items marked complete and the filtered query is executed again, which clears all items from the list.
trans-unit.target: A message dialog is displayed that indicates the number of items marked complete and the filtered query is executed again, which clears all items from the list.
